attributes.action: Reject the new London 2012 Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new London 2012 Olympics Logo has been unveiled. It would be a tragedy if this were to be the image the millions of people see and associate with out great country. Please sign up to get this design thrown out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
